title: Bangladesh Mining Production
description: Mining production in Bangladesh decreased 10.80 percent in July of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Mining Production in Bangladesh averaged 1.12 percent from 2014 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 34 percent in April of 2015 and a record low of -31 percent in May of 2021. This page provides - Bangladesh Mining Production- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bangladesh Bureau of Statistics (BBS)
